description: These are ninja clothes. It is black in order to be able to blend in with the dark night. In reality, the actual ninja wore leaf colored camoflage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
We reinforced the black sheath with modern materials. From the ancient times, the main character's costume is determined to be red.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
It is a set of ninja's hood, bowl and face cheeks.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A reinforced ninja hood with modern materials. A compact gas mask, dual structure goggles that can shield light are attached. Two characters of shinobi kill are engraved on the face cheek.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Worn under your clothes, made of steel chain that a ninja wore for battle. It is heavy and difficult to handle, but it has excellent cutting-edge performance.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
It is a lightweight body armor made of Kevlar plate and superalloy. It is made to not interfere with ninja's light and light action.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

It is a glove that a ninja wore for battle. It is reinforced with an iron plate and it is sturdy. It does not disturb the movement of the fingertip.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
These ninja gloves were strengthened with modern materials  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Tabi is a type of Japanese shoes with a shoe sole on socks, which is a reproduction of what the ninja used.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

These tabi were strengthened with modern materials. We have devised to keep light movement in every environment. To that extent, the blade preventive performance has been sacrificed.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

It is a backpack type jet pack. Rocket fuel is necessary but high speed movement is possible by flying. If the output is made too strong, it will not reach the second floor of the house because it burns the buttocks.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

It is a backpack type jet pack. Rocket fuel is necessary but high speed movement is possible by flying. If the output is made too strong, it will not reach the second floor of the house because it burns the buttocks. It is on.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
